select board_bno_seq.currval from dual
insert into board (bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bdate, bpassword, bhitcount, boriginalfilename, bsavedfilename, bfilecontent) values (board_bno_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, sysdate, #{bpassword}, 0, #{boriginalfilename}, #{bsavedfilename}, #{bfilecontent})
mapper.select: select bno , btitle , bwriter , bdate, bhitcount from board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set bhitcount=#{bhitcount} where bno=#{bno}
